## Functions

### generateSignedDivisionCode() {#a045f5491e24124a1ee6f454e5119c38c}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static Value &#42; generateSignedDivisionCode (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; Dividend, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; Divisor, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilder">IRBuilder</a>&lt;&gt; &amp; Builder)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Generate code to divide two signed integers.

Returns the quotient, rounded towards 0. Builder&#39;s insert point should be pointing where the caller wants code generated, e.g. at the sdiv instruction. This will generate a udiv in the process, and Builder&#39;s insert point will be pointing at the udiv (if present, i.e. not folded), ready to be expanded if the user wishes.

Definition at line <a href="#l00099">99</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/integerdivision-cpp">IntegerDivision.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### generateSignedRemainderCode() {#ab15480fad5e956eadbf7c6fa518c642e}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static Value &#42; generateSignedRemainderCode (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; Dividend, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; Divisor, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilder">IRBuilder</a>&lt;&gt; &amp; Builder)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Generate code to compute the remainder of two signed integers.

Returns the remainder, which will have the sign of the dividend. Builder&#39;s insert point should be pointing where the caller wants code generated, e.g. at the srem instruction. This will generate a urem in the process, and Builder&#39;s insert point will be pointing at the uren (if present, i.e. not folded), ready to be expanded if the user wishes

Definition at line <a href="#l00032">32</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/integerdivision-cpp">IntegerDivision.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

  labels = {["static"]}>
Generates code to divide two unsigned scalar 32-bit or 64-bit integers.

Returns the quotient, rounded towards 0. Builder&#39;s insert point should point where the caller wants code generated, e.g. at the udiv instruction.

Definition at line <a href="#l00141">141</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/integerdivision-cpp">IntegerDivision.cpp</a>.

<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Generate code to divide two signed integers. Returns the quotient, rounded</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// towards 0 Builder&#39;s insert point should be pointing where the caller wants</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// code generated, e.g. at the sdiv instruction. This will generate a udiv in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the process, and Builder&#39;s insert point will be pointing at the udiv (if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// present, i.e. not folded), ready to be expanded if the user wishes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99" lineLink="#a045f5491e24124a1ee6f454e5119c38c"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="#a045f5491e24124a1ee6f454e5119c38c">generateSignedDivisionCode</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Dividend, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Divisor,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                         <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilder">IRBuilder&lt;&gt;</a> &amp;Builder) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Implementation taken from compiler-rt&#39;s &#95;&#95;divsi3 and &#95;&#95;divdi3</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abee0df5f7f703bb4462aba260ba0a60f">BitWidth</a> = Dividend-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a0344a49526443edf90cc0aef3abd3337">getType</a>()-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#a13e877ef779ba7a0688081079f4f9b03">getIntegerBitWidth</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantint">ConstantInt</a> &#42;Shift = Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a95df4f20c933779306b9a936b88b99a5">getIntN</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abee0df5f7f703bb4462aba260ba0a60f">BitWidth</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abee0df5f7f703bb4462aba260ba0a60f">BitWidth</a> - 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Following instructions are generated for both i32 (shift 31) and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// i64 (shift 63).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ;   %tmp    = ashr i32 %dividend, 31</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ;   %tmp1   = ashr i32 %divisor, 31</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ;   %tmp2   = xor i32 %tmp, %dividend</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ;   %u&#95;dvnd = sub nsw i32 %tmp2, %tmp</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ;   %tmp3   = xor i32 %tmp1, %divisor</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ;   %u&#95;dvsr = sub nsw i32 %tmp3, %tmp1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ;   %q&#95;sgn  = xor i32 %tmp1, %tmp</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ;   %q&#95;mag  = udiv i32 %u&#95;dvnd, %u&#95;dvsr</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ;   %tmp4   = xor i32 %q&#95;mag, %q&#95;sgn</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ;   %q      = sub i32 %tmp4, %q&#95;sgn</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Dividend      = Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a563ec77bbc82ad22aab9621dd14c01cd">CreateFreeze</a>(Dividend);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Generates code to divide two unsigned scalar 32-bit or 64-bit integers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Returns the quotient, rounded towards 0 Builder&#39;s insert point should</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// point where the caller wants code generated, e.g. at the udiv instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141" lineLink="#ae01a605dfa5a83e767612e4124bb6e57"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="#ae01a605dfa5a83e767612e4124bb6e57">generateUnsignedDivisionCode</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Dividend, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Divisor,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                           <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilder">IRBuilder&lt;&gt;</a> &amp;Builder) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The basic algorithm can be found in the compiler-rt project&#39;s</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// implementation of &#95;&#95;udivsi3.c. Here, we do a lower-level IR based approach</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that&#39;s been hand-tuned to lessen the amount of control flow involved.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Some helper values</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &#42;CTLZ =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/intrinsic/#a0cff8be0190d8e20b7cf13646f34afa2">Intrinsic::getOrInsertDeclaration</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>-&gt;getParent(), Intrinsic::ctlz, DivTy);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Our CFG is going to look like:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// +---------------------+</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// | special-cases       |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// |   ...               |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// +---------------------+</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  |       |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  |   +----------+</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  |   |  bb1     |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  |   |  ...     |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  |   +----------+</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  |    |      |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  |    |  +------------+</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  |    |  |  preheader |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  |    |  |  ...       |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  |    |  +------------+</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  |    |      |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  |    |      |      +---+</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  |    |      |      |   |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  |    |  +------------+ |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  |    |  |  do-while  | |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  |    |  |  ...       | |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  |    |  +------------+ |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  |    |      |      |   |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  |   +-----------+  +---+</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  |   | loop-exit |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  |   |  ...      |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  |   +-----------+</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  |     |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// +-------+</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// | ...   |</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// First off, check for special cases: dividend or divisor is zero, divisor</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is greater than dividend, and divisor is 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ; special-cases:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ;   %ret0&#95;1      = icmp eq i32 %divisor, 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ;   %ret0&#95;2      = icmp eq i32 %dividend, 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ;   %ret0&#95;3      = or i1 %ret0&#95;1, %ret0&#95;2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ;   %tmp0        = tail call i32 @llvm.ctlz.i32(i32 %divisor, i1 true)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ;   %tmp1        = tail call i32 @llvm.ctlz.i32(i32 %dividend, i1 true)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ;   %sr          = sub nsw i32 %tmp0, %tmp1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ;   %ret0&#95;4      = icmp ugt i32 %sr, 31</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ;   %ret0        = select i1 %ret0&#95;3, i1 true, i1 %ret0&#95;4</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ;   %retDividend = icmp eq i32 %sr, 31</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ;   %retVal      = select i1 %ret0, i32 0, i32 %dividend</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Generate code to calculate the remainder of two integers, replacing Rem with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the generated code. This currently generates code using the udiv expansion,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// but future work includes generating more specialized code, e.g. when more</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// information about the operands are known.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Replace Rem with generated code.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad0154d60f04a5d8549b44635852557f0"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad0154d60f04a5d8549b44635852557f0">llvm::expandRemainder</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binaryoperator">BinaryOperator</a> &#42;Rem) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((Rem-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binaryoperator/#a31bf07f3f61525486633bc1d0bbaf029">getOpcode</a>() == Instruction::SRem ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><span class="doxyHighlight">          Rem-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binaryoperator/#a31bf07f3f61525486633bc1d0bbaf029">getOpcode</a>() == Instruction::URem) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><span class="doxyHighlight">         </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Trying to expand remainder from a non-remainder function&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilder">IRBuilder&lt;&gt;</a> Builder(Rem);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// First prepare the sign if it&#39;s a signed remainder</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Rem-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binaryoperator/#a31bf07f3f61525486633bc1d0bbaf029">getOpcode</a>() == Instruction::SRem) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check whether this is the insert point while Rem is still valid.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IsInsertPoint = Rem-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-node-impl/#af719fc783be6589465137d997701a432">getIterator</a>() == Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a4e5c1b91bf5e2860398e3fa35c96b5af">GetInsertPoint</a>();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="374"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we didn&#39;t actually generate an urem instruction, we&#39;re done</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This happens for example if the input were constant. In this case the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Builder insertion point was unchanged</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Rem = BO;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="390"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="391"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Expand the udiv</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="392"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binaryoperator">BinaryOperator</a> &#42;UDiv = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;BinaryOperator&gt;</a>(Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a4e5c1b91bf5e2860398e3fa35c96b5af">GetInsertPoint</a>())) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
